name: Hivemind (nickberezny)
description:
Controls:

WASD : Move

E: Build hive on designated spots (25 pollen)

Left Mouse: Shoot (point and click)

Middle Mouse: Change 'gun' (when unlocked)

Right Mouse: Swarm Attack (50 pollen, when unlocked)

UI

Honeycombs: Health

Yellow circle: Pollen count

Game,  sprites, and music by Nick Berezy.

Background images from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/farland-skies-cl... and https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/tiles/parallax-dusk-...
